original_text: thus says the Lord God: Remove the turban and take off the crown. Things shall not remain as they are. Exalt that which is low, and bring low that which is exalted.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 관을 제거하며 왕관을 벗길지라 그대로 두지 못하리니 낮은 자를 높이고 높은 자를 낮출 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Things shall not remain as they are
sentences.korean_translation: 온갖 것이 그대로 있지 못할 것이라

sentences.original_text: and bring low that which is exalted
